sn17.30:1.2: “Yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo tassapāhaṃ lābhasakkārasiloko antarāyāya vadāmī”ti.
sn17.30:1.3: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn17.30:1.4: “kissa pana, bhante, khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno lābhasakkārasiloko antarāyāyā”ti?
sn17.30:1.5: “Yā hissa sā, ānanda, akuppā cetovimutti nāhaṃ tassā lābhasakkārasilokaṃ antarāyāya vadāmi.
sn17.30:1.6: Ye ca khvassa, ānanda, appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārā adhigatā tesāhamassa lābhasakkārasilokaṃ antarāyāya vadāmi.
sn17.30:1.7: Evaṃ dāruṇo kho, ānanda, lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
sn17.30:1.9: ‘uppannaṃ lābhasakkārasilokaṃ pajahissāma, na ca no uppanno lābhasakkārasiloko cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti.
